actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide access to small businesses and other persons, of information concerning rules applicable to such businesses or persons.
short_title: Small Business Regulatory Information Act of 1980

summary.text: Small Business Regulatory Information Act of 1980 - Requires each agency to publish in the Federal Register along with each proposed or promulgated rule the standard industrial classification code for each industry affected by such rule. Requires the Director of the Federal Register to establish (in the Office of the Federal Register) a Small Business Information Center to provide a listing of rules applicable to any industry within a specified standard industrial classification.

titles.title: Small Business Regulatory Information Act of 1980
A bill to provide access to small businesses and other persons, of information concerning rules applicable to such businesses or persons.
